sentences.en: AI no longer dumps their entire nuclear arsenal on the barbarians.
sentences.cn: AI不会把自己所有的核弹都扔在蛮族身上.

sentences.en: He can't cope and dumps his two teenage boys on them to be looked after.
sentences.cn: 他应付不过来，只能将他那两个十来岁的儿子交给他们代为照看。

sentences.en: He dumps his cup of coffee over the edge of the flet.
sentences.cn: 他一下把咖啡泼到了望台的外面.

sentences.en: He has been in the dumps ever since he lost his wife.
sentences.cn: 他自从丧偶以后一直怏怏不乐.

sentences.en: He was down in the dumps after losing his job.
sentences.cn: 他失业后,精神非常颓丧.

sentences.en: I am down in the dumps about the defeat.
It is estimated there are 1500 dumps in existence today.
sentences.cn: 现存的澳大利亚大孔环币币芯大约有1500枚.

sentences.en: It produces more than it needs, then dumps its surplus onto the world market.
sentences.cn: 当产量超过需求时，过剩的产品便倾销到世界市场。

sentences.en: Metal mine waste tailing dumps are a typical degenerated ecosystem.
sentences.cn: 尾矿废弃地是一种典型的退化生态系统.

sentences.en: Miki is sure down in the dumps these days.
sentences.cn: 米基这些天的确有些闷闷不乐.

sentences.en: Otherwise it must detach units to preserve signal and road communications, protect dumps and convoys.
sentences.cn: 否则必须派遣部队去维持秩序和交通, 保护仓库和运输.

sentences.en: She's feeling a bit down in the dumps and needs cheering up.
sentences.cn: 她情绪有点低落，需要振奋起来。

sentences.en: The interest in who dumps whom, and how, is phenomenal.
sentences.cn: 人们对谁甩谁以及怎样甩的兴趣是惊人的.

sentences.en: You look ( a little bit ) down in the dumps.
sentences.cn: 你看起来 ( 有点 ) 愁眉苦脸.

sentences.en: You look like you're down in the dumps. What's wrong?
sentences.cn: 你看起来心情好似沉到谷底. 怎么回事?

words.tran_cn: 废物，垃圾场（dump的复数）；忧郁

trans.tran_en: a state of melancholy or depression (esp in the phrase down in the dumps)

trans.tran_cn: 倾倒( dump的第三人称单数 )，丢下，随便堆放，释放
